fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: -Choose two roles, and choose one word from each of them to swap around with each other.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
-The ability will fail if you choose a role not in game.
-The people you switch will be rapped.
-If the person’s new role rules are deemed “incomprehensible”, the ability fails, unless you explain what it means and the host agrees to it.
-You must choose if WIN is to see town win, see an Evil Faction win, or have NK goal before the game begins. If you don't, one is randomly chosen.
